33 /* ====================================================================================================
34  HSP_REGS Module Instances Register Address Defintions
35  ==================================================================================================== */
36 #define ADDR_HSP_REGS_ADI_S2H_MBX_CTRL (0X00U) /* System to HSP Mailbox Interrupt Control */
37 #define ADDR_HSP_REGS_ADI_S2H_MBX_STS (0X02U) /* System to HSP Mailbox Interrupt Status */
38 #define ADDR_HSP_REGS_ADI_S2H_MBX_FIFO_PUSH (0X04U) /* Write to this register pushes data into the S2H FIFO */
39 #define ADDR_HSP_REGS_ADI_S2H_MBX_FIFO_POP (0X06U) /* System Write Data into the FIFO. */
40 #define ADDR_HSP_REGS_ADI_H2S_MBX_CTRL (0X08U) /* HSP to System Mailbox Interrupt Control */
41 #define ADDR_HSP_REGS_ADI_H2S_MBX_INSTS (0X0AU) /* HSP to System Mailbox Interrupt Statu */
42 #define ADDR_HSP_REGS_ADI_H2S_MBX_FIFO_PUSH (0X0CU) /* HSP to System Mailbox Write Data into the FIFO. */
43 #define ADDR_HSP_REGS_ADI_H2S_MBX_FIFO_POP (0X0EU) /* HSP to System Mailbox Read Data from the FIFO */
44
